attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There can be no doubt that the last vestiges of democracy died in Britain today. The call for  referendum on the Lisbon treaty was refused. No country can claim to be a democracy when it takes such a vital decision without consulting its public. Its clear the Labour government has lost touch with the people and failed them utterly and completely. We would be better off if they were removed before all of our powers are given away to a faceless european elite.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
